Verses: 1 raajaavaagiya Esekkiyaa Adhaikkettapodhu Than Vasthirangalaik Kizhiththu, Rattu Uduththukkondu, Karththarudaiya Aalayaththil Pravesiththu,

2 aramanai Visaarippukkaaranaagiya Eliyaakkeemaiyum, Sambiradhiyaagiya Sepnaavaiyum, Aasaariyargalin Moopparaiyum, Aamodhsin Kumaaranaagiya Esaayaa Ennum Theerkkadharisiyinidaththirku Rattu Uduththavargalaaga Anuppinaan.
3 ivargal Avanai Nokki: Indhanaal Nerukkamum, Kandidhamum, Dhooshanamum Anubavikkira Naal; Pillaipperu Nokkiyirukkiradhu; Peravo Belan Illai.

4 jeevanulla Dhevanai Nindhikkumpadi, Aseeriyaa Raajaavaagiya Than Aandavanaal Anuppappatta Rapsaakke Sonna Vaarththaigalai Umadhu Dhevanaagiya Karththarkettirukkiraar; Umadhu Dhevanaagiya Karththar Kettirukkira Vaarththaigalinimiththam Thandanaiseyvaar; Aagaiyaal, Innum Meedhiyaayirukkiravargalukkaaga Vinnappancheyveeraaga Endru Esekkiyaa Sollachchonnaar Endraargal.
5 ivvidhamaai Esekkiyaa Raajaavin Oozhiyakkaarar Esaayaavinidaththil Vandhu Sonnaargal.
6 appozhudhu Esaayaa Avargalainokki: Aseeriyaa Raajaavin Oozhiyakkaarar Ennai Dhooshiththadhum Neer Kettadhumaana Vaarththaigalinaale Bayappadaadheyum.

7 idho, Avan Oru Seydhiyaikkettu, Than Dhesaththukkuth Thirumbuvadharkaana Aaviyai Naan Avanukkul Anuppi, Avanai Avan Dhesaththile Pattayaththaal Vizhappannuven Endru Karththar Uraikkiraar Enbadhai Ungal Aandavanidaththil Sollungal Endraan.
8 aseeriyaa Raajaa Laageesaivittup Purappattaan Endru Kelvippattu, Rapsaakke Thirumbippoi, Avan Lipnaavinmel Yuththampannugiradhaik Kandaan.
9 appozhudhu, Eththiyoppiyaavin Raajaavaagiya Thiraakkaa Ummodu Yuththampannap Purappattaan Endru Sollak Kelvippattaan; Adhaik Kettapodhu Avan Esekkiyaavinidaththukku Sthaanaapadhigalai Anuppi:

10 neengal Yoodhaavin Raajaavaagiya Esekkiyaavukku Sollavendiyadhu Ennavendraal, Erusalem Aseeriyaa Raajaavin Kaiyil Oppukkodukkappaduvadhillai Endru Nee Nambiyirukkira Un Dhevan Unnai Eththavottaadhe.
11 idho, Aseeriyaa Raajaakkal Sagala Dhesangalaiyum Sangariththa Seydhiyai Nee Kelvippattirukkiraai; Nee Thappuvaayo?
12 en Pidhaakkal Azhiththuvitta Kosaanaiyum, Aaraanaiyum, Redhseppaiyum, Thelaasaarilirundha Edhenin Puththiraraiyum Avargaludaiya Dhevargal Thappuviththadhundo?
13 aamaaththin Raajaavum, Arpaaththin Raajaavum, Sepparvaayeem Enaa Eevaa Pattanangalin Raajaavum Enge Endru Sollungal Endraar.
14 esekkiyaa Sthaanaapadhigalin Kaiyilirundha Nirubaththai Vaangi Vaasiththaan; Pinbu Esekkiyaa Karththarudaiya Aalayaththirkup Poi Adhaik Karththarukkumunbaaga Viriththu,
15 karththarai Nokki:
16 senaigalin Karththaave, Kerubeengalin Maththiyil Vaasampannugira Isravelin Dhevane, Neer Oruvare Boomiyin Raajyangalukkellaam Dhevanaanavar; Neer Vaanaththaiyum Boomiyaiyum Undaakkineer.
17 karththaave, Umadhu Seviyai Saaiththukkelum; Karththaave, Neer Umadhu Kangalaith Thirandhupaarum, Sanakerip Jeevanulla Dhevanai Nindhikkumpadikku Solliyanuppina Vaarththaigalaiyellaam Kelum.
18 karththaave, Aseeriyaa Raajaakkal Andha Jaadhigalaiyum, Avargal Dhesaththaiyum Naasamaakki,
19 avargaludaiya Dhevargalai Neruppile Pottuvittadhu Meydhaan; Avaigal Dhevargal Allave, Manushar Kaivelaiyaana Maramum Kallundhaane; Aagaiyaal Avaigalai Neerththuliyaakkinaargal.
20 ippodhum Engal Dhevanaagiya Karththaave, Neer Oruvare Karththar Endru Boomiyin Raajyangalellaam Ariyumpadikku, Engalai Avan Kaikku Neengalaakki Ratchiyum Endru Vinnappampanninaan.

21 appozhudhu Aamodhsin Kumaaranaagiya Esaayaa, Esekkiyaavukku Solliyanuppinadhu: Isravelin Dhevanaagiya Karththar Uraikkiradhu Ennavendraal, Aseeriyaa Raajaavaagiya Sanakeripinimiththam Nee Ennai Nokki Vinnappampanninaaye.

22 avanaikkuriththuk Karththar Sollugira Vasanamaavadhu: Seeyon Kumaaraththiyaagiya Kanniyaasthree Unnai Igazhndhu, Unnaip Parigaasampannugiraal; Erusalem Kumaaraththi Un Pinnaale Thalaiyaith Thulukkugiraal.
23 yaarai Nindhiththu Dhooshiththaai? Yaarukku Virodhamaai Un Saththaththai Uyarththinaai? Nee Isravelin Parisuththarukku Virodhamaai Allavo Un Kangalai Mettimaiyaai Ereduththaai.

24 un Oozhiyakkaararaikkondu Aandavarai Nindhiththu: En Radhangalin Thiralinaale Naan Malaigalin Kodumudigalukkum Leebanonin Sigarangalukkum Vandhu Erinen; Adhin Uyaramaana Kedhurumarangalaiyum, Uchchidhamaana Dhevadhaaru Virutchangalaiyum Naan Vetti, Uyarndha Adhin Kadaisi Ellaimattum, Adhin Sezhumaiyaana Vanamattum Varuven Endrum,
25 naan Kinaru Vettith Thanneer Kudiththen; En Ullankaalinaal Aranippaana Idangalin Agazhigalaiyellaam Varalavum Panninen Endrum Sonnaai.

26 naan Vegukaalaththukkumun Adhai Niyamiththu, Poorvanaatkalmudhal Adhaith Thittampanninen Enbadhai Nee Kettadhillaiyo? Ippozhudhu Nee Aranaana Pattanangalaip Paazhaana Manmedugalaakkumpadi Naane Adhai Sambavikkappanninen.

27 adhinaale Avaigalin Kudigal Kaiyilaiththavargalaagi, Kalangi Vetkappattu, Veliyin Poondukkum, Pachchilaikkum, Veedugalinmel Mulaikkum Pullukkum Ongi Valarumun Theeyndhupom Payirukkum Samaanamaanaargal.
28 un Iruppaiyum, Un Pokkaiyum, Un Varavaiyum, Nee Enakku Virodhamaaik Kondhalikkiradhaiyum Ariven.

29 nee Enakku Virodhamaaik Kondhaliththu, Veeriyampesinadhu En Sevigalil Erinapadiyinaale, Naan En Thurattai Un Mookkilum, En Kadivaalaththai Un Vaayilum Pottu, Nee Vandha Vazhiye Unnaith Thirumbappannuven.

30 unakku Adaiyaalamaayiruppadhu Ennavendraal: Indha Varushaththile Thappip Payiraagiradhaiyum, Irandaam Varushaththile Thaanaai Vilaigiradhaiyum Saappiduveergal; Moondraam Varushaththilo Vidhaiththu Aruththu, Dhraatchaththottangalai Naatti, Avaigalin Kanigalaip Pusippeergal.
31 yoodhaa Vamsaththaaril Thappi Meendhirukkiravargal Marupadiyum Keezhe Verpatri Mele Kanikoduppaargal.
32 meedhiyaayirukkiravargal Erusalemilum, Thappinavargal Seeyon Malaiyilumirundhu Purappapaduvaargal; Senaigaludaiya Karththarin Vairaakkiyam Idhai Seyyum.

33 aagaiyaal Karththar Aseeriyaa Raajaavaikkuriththu: Avan Indha Nagaraththukkul Pravesippadhillai; Idhinmel Ambu Eyvadhumillai; Idharkumunbaagak Kedagaththode Varuvadhumillai; Idharku Edhiraagak Koththalampoduvadhumillai.
34 avan Indha Nagaraththukkul Pravesiyaamal, Thaan Vandhavazhiye Thirumbippovaan.
35 ennimiththamum En Dhaasanaagiya Dhaaveedhinimiththamum, Naan Indha Nagaraththai Ratchikkumpadikku Idharku Aadharavaayiruppen Enbadhaik Karththar Uraikkiraar Endru Solliyanuppinaan.

36 appozhudhu Karththarudaiya Thoodhan Purappattu, Aseeriyarin Paalayaththil Latchaththenbaththaiyaayiramperai Sangariththaan; Adhikaalame Ezhundhirukkumpodhu, Idho, Avargalellaarum Seththa Predhangalaaik Kidandhaargal.
37 appozhudhu Aseeriyaa Raajaavaagiya Sanakerip Prayaanappattuth Thirumbippoi, Niniveyil Irundhuvittaan.

38 avan Than Dhevanaagiya Nisrogin Kovilile Panindhukollugirapodhu, Avan Kumaararaagiya Adhramalekkum Saredhserum Avanaip Pattayaththinaal Vettippottu, Araraa Dhesaththukkuth Thappi Odipponaargal; Avan Kumaaranaagiya Esaraththon Avan Pattaththirku Vandhu Arasaandaan.
